Segment.name: T1
Segment.comment: To specify origin point and waybill references of movement to transit waybill point

Field.name: AssignedNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: WaybillNumber
Field.comment: Carrier accounting number of the waybill for the inbound movement

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: StandardPointLocationCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard Point Location) defined by National Motor Freight Tariff Association (NMFTA) or the Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) point development group as the official code assigned to a city or point (for ratemaking purposes) within a city

Field.name: TransitRegistrationNumber
Field.comment: Freight bill or bureau number used to identify a transit shipment

Field.name: TransitLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating level of inbound transit references
